biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia  

  Lakshmikant Berde (3 November 1954 – 16 December 2004; Mumbai) was an Indian actor who appeared in Marathi and Hindi movies.  

  Description above from the Wikipedia article Lakshmikant Berde, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Laxmikant Berde
